item.description:
Time: 5.45pm - 8pm Place: 271 Crown Street, downtown New Haven.

New location! Change is good.

The Nice folks at Geronimo's have have saves the patio for us! (if it is inclement we can step indoors.

If you are the first person, hang around for a bit, the meetup is casual and people will straggle in between 5:30 and 6:30. Please RSVP in Advance! Please also note that we do not ever officially cancel the meetup (for those who live downtown or close by), but in instances of bad weather, if you do come, please don't expect our full crowd!

 

Look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Monthly Networking Event
